title: Drawing, "Valley among Mountains, Guanoco, near Guaranda,  Ecuador.", June 11, 1857
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at left center: Lugt 457d
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  near Guaranda / Guanoco  near Guanoco June 11th //57 / Distant Mountains very delicate blue -- Clouds very bright

Verso: In scribed in graphite, at right center: 1917.4.102.
description: Horizontal oblique distant view of a valley stretching toward right, with a house visible in the central foreground and two people walking at the right.  Lateral, high bottom margins.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Valley among Mountains, Guanoco, near Guaranda,  Ecuador.", June 11, 1857.
June 11, 1857. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-102.
